feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.31.0
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(call-flows): manual subflow trigger and call flow action (#5573) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(assemblyai): add actions for transcripts and LeMUR resources (#5560) @Swimburger
  • fix(typeform): add pagination to list more than 10 forms (#5557) @kishanprmr
  • fix(zoom): resolve zoom authentication error (code: 4700) (#5554) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: signed in users in last 30 days (#5583) @abuaboud
  • fix: audit logs table pagination wasn't working + add audit logs for signing in (#5582) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: resolve options for private piece with absolute verison (#5581) @abuaboud
  • fix: analytics dashboard (#5580) @abuaboud
  • fix: accept other non hex characters in encryption key (#5579) @abuaboud
  • fix: skip sending email on duplicate invitation (#5577) @abuaboud
  • fix: svg piece logo rendering at 0x0 (#5574) @kamal
  • fix: projects table pagination (#5570) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: users were not able to scroll the list of projects they have in project switcher dropdown (#5569) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: 'Built with Activepieces' note wasn't in the correct position on the screen while scrolling (#5568) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: platform oauth2 connection creation (#5564) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(user-invitation): auto accept invitation through api keys (#5561) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: added back piece management for projects (#5572) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: remove upsert project member api (#5578) @abuaboud
  • chore: upgrade @segment/analytics-next from 1.67.0 to 1.72.0 (#5563) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Swimburger, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel, @kamal, @kishanprmr and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.32.0
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(smaily): custom api call action (#5610) @lostinbug
  • feat(linear): add updated and removed issue trigger (#5602) @thibclz
  • feat(metabase): raise error when question fails (#5603) @thibclz
  • fix(chargekeep): update gender input, and add helper function for default date (#5588) @Trayshmhirk
  • feat(pieces-assemblyai): add instructions / validate api keys (#5596) @Swimburger
  • feat: add qrcode piece (#5525) @MrMYHuang

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: spelling (editior -> editor, intalled -> installed) (#5608) @kamal
  • fix: send authorization method on (notion) oauth2 connection (#5612) @abuaboud
  • fix: disable insert in loops (#5605) @abuaboud
  • fix: hide project swithcer in embed (#5600) @abuaboud
  • fix: tweak dark theme (#5599) @abuaboud
  • fix: empty variable on resolving with v8 isolate (#5594) @abuaboud
  • fix: array inputs weren't saving after deleting then adding them back (#5593) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: send user invitation validation & remove project member endpoint (#5591) @abuaboud
  • fix: form results names were not being formatted correctly (#5590) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add lostinbug as a contributor for plugin (#5611) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • security: upgrade drip-nodejs from 3.1.1 to 3.1.2 (#5598) @abuaboud
  • chore(deps): bump dset from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 (#5586) @dependabot

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @MrMYHuang, @Swimburger, @Trayshmhirk, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @kamal, @kishanprmr, @lostinbug, @snyk-bot and @thibclz

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.32.1
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add date and list branch operators (#5550) @rita-gorokhod
  • feat(ai): unified AI sdk + Text AI Piece (#5468) @anasbarg
  • feat: switch project automatically to the flow project (#5621) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: support s3 for file storage (#5609) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • fix(linkedin): company dropdown (#5631) @abuaboud
  • fix(sperse): triggers now showing (#5625) @Trayshmhirk
  • feat(google-search-console): search analytics, URL inspection and other 5 actions (#5622) @gushkool
  • feat(sperse): create invoice, get contact detail, create product, including more 3 actions and 3 triggers (#5587) @Trayshmhirk
  • chore(chargekeep): update piece description (#5620) @Trayshmhirk
  • fix(supabase): authentication now works (#5617) @abuaboud

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • feat: add optional validation check to OAuth2 (#5616) @kamal
  • feat: support customizing the props in createCustomApiCallAction (#5626) @kamal

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: step instructions were not being shown in correct format (#5633) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: increase limit size in project switcher (#5632) @abuaboud
  • fix: duplicate form run (#5630) @abuaboud
  • fix: add memory files back (#5629) @abuaboud
  • fix: upload piece through ui (#5628) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add date and list branch operators (#5550) @rita-gorokhod
  • feat: add ai tokens limit to embed jwt (#5627) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add gushkool as a contributor for plugin (#5623) @allcontributors
  • docs: improve hiring docs (#5614) @abuaboud

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: unified ai & db migration (#5619) @abuaboud
  • chore(assemblyai): update readme of pieces-assemblyai (#5597) @Swimburger

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Swimburger, @Trayshmhirk, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @anasbarg, @gushkool, @kamal, @kishanprmr and @rita-gorokhod

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.32.2
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: pan to step in canvas if it is clicked inside run details or incomplete steps widget (#5615) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: remove email authentication when platform admin disables it (#5644) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: "Add Email" in alerts page wasn't working (#5644) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: loops weren't showing failed step in them after run finishes (#5615) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • chore(talkable): removed 'no error on failure' checkbox property (#5638) @Vitalini
  • fix(airtable): add aiText field type (#5642) @kishanprmr

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Vitalini, @abuaboud and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.32.3
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(upgrade.chat): create invoice, get contact detail, create product, including more 3 actions and 3 triggers (#5640) @OmarSayed
  • feat(linka): create invoice, get contact detail, create product, including more 3 actions and 3 triggers (#5639) @OmarSayed

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: steps logos looked squished in run details (#5659) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: SSO sign ups used to fail if the user doesn't have a first or last name (#5659) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: Show publish button inside builder for Operator users (#5659) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: project switcher search wasn't working (#5656) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: allow replacing empty steps from previous UI (#5649) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • docs: add OmarSayed as a contributor for plugin (#5652) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @OmarSayed, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @anasbarg and @kishanprmr
